titleStmt.title: By the Quene. The Quenes Maiestie perceauing, that not withstandyng the notorious offence of Thomas Cobham, committed on the seas, against certayne subiectes of her good brother the Kynge of Spayne ...
Proclamations. 1564-07-21
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richard Iugge and Iohn Cawood, printers to the Quenes Maiestie [i.e. B. Norton and J. Bill],

notesStmt.note: A proclamation for apprehension of Thomas Cobham, pirate.
Actual printers' names and suggested publication date from STC.
Last complete line of text ends: "com".
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
